SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Teamcity URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Generate Config and Response file in temp directory of Agent : SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_TMC_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#, "buildnodeconfig-&$RUNID#.xml") : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESPONSE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#, "triggerbuild-&$RUNID#.xml") : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_CONFIGFILE#,,"TOP" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_RESPONSE#,,"TOP"
! Save Contents of Config file : SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_CONFIG#) : IF &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = 0 : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#, &UC4RB_TMC_CONFIGFILE#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) : ENDIF : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
! Decrypte Password : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!-------------------------------------Create cURL command to call Teamcity REST api--------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = "curl "
! Teamcity url :SET &UC4RB_TMC_TRIGGER_BUILD_URL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_URL#, "/httpAuth/app/rest/buildQueue") :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_TMC_TRIGGER_BUILD_URL# :SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, "&UC4RB_TMC_OPTION_VALUE# ")
:SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, "--request POST --header ""Content-Type:application/xml"" --data-binary @&UC4RB_TMC_CONFIGFILE# --output &UC4RB_TMC_RESPONSE# --silent")
!-------------------------------------Execute curl cmd based on AGENT OS-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC_WIN_TYP NE "EXTCOMPROC" echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#" SetLocal EnableDelayedExpansion FOR /F %%a IN ('&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#:%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" -w %%{http_code}') DO ( SET RESP_HTTP_CODE=%%a ) SetLocal DisableDelayedExpansion : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS echo "INFO: HTTP RESPONSE CODE: %RESP_HTTP_CODE%" IF %RESP_HTTP_CODE% NEQ 200 ( SET ERRORS=1 IF %RESP_HTTP_CODE% EQU 000 ( ECHO "ERROR: ERROR COMMUNICATING WITH TEAMCITY. CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS." ) ELSE ( ECHO "ERROR: RESPONSE FROM TEAMCITY" TYPE &UC4RB_TMC_RESPONSE# ECHO "" ) ) : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#" RESP_HTTP_CODE=`&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#:$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" -w %{http_code}` !:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX echo "INFO: HTTP RESPONSE CODE: $RESP_HTTP_CODE" if [ "$RESP_HTTP_CODE" -ne "200" ] then errors=1 if [ "$RESP_HTTP_CODE" -eq "000" ] then echo "ERROR: ERROR COMMUNICATING WITH TEAMCITY. CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS." else echo "ERROR: RESPONSE FROM TEAMCITY" cat &UC4RB_TMC_RESPONSE# echo "" fi fi :ENDIF
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** TRIGGER BUILD ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** TRIGGER BUILD ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.READ_FILE !Processing the XML file :SET &ROOTHND# = XML_OPEN(STRING, &UC4RB_TMC_FILE_CONTENT#) :IF &ROOTHND# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&ROOTHND#, "@id") : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#,,"TOP" :ENDIF :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID# = "" :ENDIF
